Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Washington and Ashland, over normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Washington and Ashland then resume their normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running with extended wait times; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running, but with extended wait times while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
